titleInfo.title: Martha Carson and The Carlisles at Shrine Mosque

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing Grand Ole Opry stars Martha Carson, the Carlisles, George McCormick, and many others at the Shrine Mosque on February 9.
